destination.unavailable: The selected destination references an instance that is not available. Please check your destination configuration and try again.
destination.notFound: The destination target URL cannot be found. The request failed with status code 404. Please check the destination target URL connectivity in your SAP BTP cockpit.
destination.notReachable: The selected system is not reachable. System Name: {{systemName}}, Error: {{- error}}.
destination.httpConnectionError: A connection error occurred with the selected destination. HTTP Code: {{- code}}. $t(texts.seeLogForDetails)

errors.servicesUnavailable: An error occurred retrieving services for the SAP System.
errors.certificateError: A certificate error has occurred{{- errorMsg, addMsgWithColonFormatter}}
errors.urlCertValidationError: The system URL is using {{certErrorReason}} security certificate.
errors.authenticationTimeout: Authorization was not verified within the allowed time. Please ensure you have authenticated using the associated browser window.
errors.connectionError: A connection error occurred. Please ensure the target host is available on the network: {{- error}}
errors.timeout: A connection timeout error occurred{{- errorMsg, addMsgWithColonFormatter}}
errors.serverReturnedAnError: The server returned an error. {{- errorDesc}}
errors.serverUnableToCompleteRequest: The server was unable to complete the request. Please try again.
errors.odataServiceUrlNotFound: The service URL you have provided is not a valid OData Service. SAP Fiori applications require an OData service as the data source.
errors.noServicesAvailable: There are no OData V{{version}} services available from the selected system and the template you have chosen only supports OData V{{version}} services.
errors.redirectError: A redirect response was received from the server
errors.noSuchHostError: No such host is known. Ensure the host is available.
errors.noAbapEnvsInCFSpace: No ABAP environments in CF space found. Ensure an ABAP environment exists.
errors.abapEnvsCFDiscoveryFailed: Discovering ABAP Environments failed. Please ensure you are logged into Cloud Foundry. For more information, see https://docs.cloudfoundry.org/cf-cli/getting-started.html#login.
errors.systemConnectionValidationFailed: A connection to the selected system cannot be established. Ensure the credentials are valid.

texts.seeLogForDetails: For more information, see the log.
texts.checkDestinationAuthConfig: Please check the SAP BTP destination authentication configuration.
